content.rendered:
This item has a minimum order quantity of 10.

The Rio Sofa Bed has contemporary wooden legs with a buttoned back to ensure that this Sofa Bed does not look like any sofa bed. 

The Rio is perfectly comfortable and functional as a sofa as well as a bed. Ideal for commercial hospitality such as hotels, holiday parks and homes and even places within the healthcare sector, such as hospitals.

The Rio is a simple but sophisticated sofa that anyone in any type of commercial environment can enjoy. That, coupled with a high quality sofa bed, makes this a perfect buy for any hotel or holiday park. The sofa can seats up to 2 people while the sofa bed is a 2 person bed.

This is also comes with a 2 year warranty but should last for years to come.
